sys_script.name: Populate the Department

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_b061a2dc8319e210f257f3a6feaad39b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1734342_pletra_0_centralized_asset_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate the Department</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    var ga = new GlideRecord('x_1734342_pletra_0_employee_record');
    ga.addQuery('employee_name', current.assigned_to);
    ga.query();

    if (ga.next()) {
        var deptValue = ga.getValue('department'); // gets the choice value (string)
        current.department = deptValue;
        gs.info('Department set to: ' + deptValue);
    } else {
        gs.info('No matching employee record found for: ' + current.assigned_to);
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-04-30 06:35:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b061a2dc8319e210f257f3a6feaad39b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate the Department</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Pletra Asset Management" source="x_1734342_pletra_0">e2238c7b83c12210f257f3a6feaad35d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Pletra Asset Management">e2238c7b83c12210f257f3a6feaad35d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b061a2dc8319e210f257f3a6feaad39b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-04-30 07:04:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b061a2dc8319e210f257f3a6feaad39b"/></record_update>
